sentences.en: " You can carry that blue knapsack. I'll take the tan one and the tripod. "
sentences.cn: “ 你可以帮着拿那个蓝背包, 我拿那个土黄色的和三脚架. ”

sentences.en: Applied to knapsack & sports bags , insulation bags and cooling container.
sentences.cn: 背包心材、集装箱 和 保冷包心材等.

sentences.en: Backtracking to master the application of retrospective method with 0 - 1 knapsack problem.
sentences.cn: 掌握回溯法的应用用回溯法求解 0-1 背包问题.

sentences.en: Do you think she got everything into her knapsack?
sentences.cn: 你认为她把所有一切都放进了她的背包里 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fascinated by this magic light-generating globe, he cut it off with his bayonet and put it in his knapsack so he could carry around the light with him wherever he went.
sentences.cn: 他对这个会发光的小球很痴迷，于是用刺刀把它割了下来，放进自己的背包，他觉得这样他就可以把光带到任何他想去的地方了。

sentences.en: Fashion knapsack having a unique style , greatly matching the leisure decoration.
sentences.cn: 时尚的背包别具一格, 是休闲装饰的好伴侣.

sentences.en: Franklin placed the warm scarf Debbie had knitted for him in the top of his knapsack.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林把黛比为他织的暖和的围巾放在背包的最上层.

sentences.en: He unstrapped his knapsack, put it, with his stick, on the hedge-bank, and opened the gate.
sentences.cn: 他把背包从身上取下来，连同手中的棍子一起放在树篱坡上，把门打开了。

sentences.en: Squatting by one of the walls, I took a little book from my knapsack.
sentences.cn: 我蹲在胡同的墙根，从背包里拿出一本最近出版的小开本的书。

sentences.en: The function optimization and knapsack problem show the effectiveness of PEA.
sentences.cn: 函数优化和背包问题实验验证了PEA的 有效性.

sentences.en: The man took his stick and his knapsack and departed.
sentences.cn: 那人提起他的棍和布袋,走了.

sentences.en: The moment he received the order, the soldier packed his knapsack.
sentences.cn: 士兵一接到命令就打了背包.

sentences.en: Then I and son take knapsack to traveling bag to go.
sentences.cn: 于是我和儿子拿起背包行囊便走.

sentences.en: Therefore, the hybrid intelligence algorithm is effective to solve 0 - 1 knapsack problems.
sentences.cn: 因此, 应用该混合智能算法求解 0-1 背包问题是比较有效的.

sentences.en: This is about 01 knapsack problem dynamic programming algorithm.
sentences.cn: 这是关于01背包问题的动态规划算法.

sentences.en: Trial designed recursive algorithm for solving knapsack problem.
sentences.cn: 试用递归方法设计求解背包问题的算法.

sentences.en: Will my sweater go in your knapsack?
sentences.cn: 你的背包里还放得下我的球衣 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a bag that you carry on your shoulders
